Keywords: Amazon , Batman Family , Detective , Gotham City , Justice League , Metropolis , Scientist , Trinity
Real Name: Bruce Wayne
Team Up
1
TEAM UP: SUPERMAN, WONDER WOMAN: If a listed friendly character is on the map and Batman uses RALLY to choose a character with Batman team ability, Superman team ability, or Wonder Woman team ability, the chosen character also has SAFEGUARD: opposing Probability Control until your next turn.
Special Powers
RALLY (3): All Attack Rolls . FREE: Remove one of Batman's RALLY dice to choose a friendly character within range and line of fire. Until your next turn the chosen character has SAFEGUARD: Opposing Perplex.
